{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient is a 17-year-old girl with severe acne vulgaris. The treatment with oral antibiotics and topical combination therapy has not completely resolved her symptoms. Examination shows oily skin with numerous comedones, pustules, and scarring. Long-term therapy is started with combined oral contraceptive pills. Combined oral contraceptive pills contain estrogen and progestin, which can help regulate hormone levels and reduce the severity of acne.
